sentences.sContent: The dolphins disappeared beneath the waves.
Jo enjoyed feeling the warm sand beneath her feet.
sentences.sCn: 乔很喜欢脚下踩着温暖沙子的感觉。

sentences.sContent: He was standing on the bridge looking at the river beneath.
sentences.sCn: 他站在桥上，看着下面的河水。

sentences.sContent: Some roofs collapsed beneath the weight of (=  unable to support the weight of  ) so much snow.
sentences.sCn: 有些房子的屋顶不堪积雪的重压塌陷了。

sentences.sContent: ...places have been found on earth that are in total blackness such as caves several miles beneath the ocean...

remMethod.val: be(表加强) ＋ neath(在…之下) → 在…下方

trans.tranOther: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

trans.tranCn: 在…下方；低于，次于；在…掩盖下；连…也不值得，有失…的身份
